name: Dymcat
description:
Story:

Dymcat is an intrepid police rocket that is behind the "Air Pirates" that have caused damage to the town of Diamond Ville and took away all their treasures. Your mission is to recover everything stolen and arrest all possible pirates. Do you think you can do it?

Dymcat version Complete Features:

- 50 levels of pure fun.

- 5 unlockable characters, each with their own abilities.

Minimum requirements

Android:

- Minimum Android 5.0 (Lollipop)

Windows and Linux:

- Dual Core processor.

- Memory 1 Gb RAM

- Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
